arn.description: The Amazon Resourc Name (ARN) of the Device Farm device pool you wish to update.

description.description: A description of the device pool you wish to update.

name.description: A string representing the name of the device pool you wish to update.

rules.description: Represents the rules you wish to modify for the device pool. Updating rules is optional; however, if you choose to update rules for your request, the update will replace the existing rules.
